title: President Donald J. Trump Is Taking Action to Ensure that America Wins the Race to 5G – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Economy & Jobs	

Issued on:
April 12, 2019
My Administration is embracing a new spirit of innovation that will make life better for all Americans.
						 President Donald J. Trump					A GLOBAL 5G LEADER: Thanks to President Donald J. Trump, America is now leading the global race to deploy secure and reliable 5G.EMPOWERING THE WIRELESS INDUSTRY: President Trump’s policies empower the wireless industry to innovate and invest in America’s 5G capabilities, further bolstering our economy and creating millions of jobs.AMERICA FIRST – TO 5G: President Trump is ensuring that America wins the global race to 5G and remains the world leader in information and communications technology.
